_symbol_format: .TICKER YYMMDD P/C STRIKE  (positive qty = buy, negative = sell)
_source: OptionsKit SPX 9/12 Call Calendar (Conservative) â€” 79.6% win rate, 50.8% CAGR, $20Kâ†’$72.6K (Oct 2022 - Dec 2025)
notes: SPX weekly 9/12 call calendar (conservative): sell 30Î” call 9 DTE, buy same strike call 12 DTE. Every Wednesday at 2:00 PM.
rationale: More conservative variant with wider DTE gap and lower delta. 80% win rate. Better risk management with call-tested exit at -20 delta. Max $2K allocation.

entry_conditions.entry_time: 2:00 PM ET (earlier than aggressive variant â€” more time to manage)

sell_leg.note: Use exact DTE (9 days). 30 delta call = more OTM than 7/9 variant, less premium but wider margin of safety.

buy_leg.note: Same strike as sell leg. 12 DTE = 3 days more than short leg.

entry_conditions.position_sizing: Max allocation $2,000 per trade. Allocate 10% of portfolio.

futures_expiry_awareness.why_wednesday: Wednesday entry for weekly SPX options. 9 DTE lands on next Friday (or following week).
futures_expiry_awareness.avoid_quarterly_expiry: Skip quarterly futures expiry weeks â€” unusual gamma
futures_expiry_awareness.additional_exit: Exit when call tested at -20 delta (risk management not in 7/9 variant)

entry_conditions.notes: Conservative variant of the SPX call calendar. Lower delta (30 vs 40), wider DTE gap (9/12 vs 7/9), earlier entry time (2 PM vs 3 PM), max allocation $2K, AND exit when call tested at -20 delta. Slightly lower CAGR (51% vs 64%) but better max drawdown management.

pnl_drivers.max_profit: Profit target 50% of debit (more conservative than 30% in 7/9 variant)
pnl_drivers.max_loss: Net debit paid OR triggered at -20 delta test (whichever comes first)
pnl_drivers.primary_driver: Theta differential â€” 9 DTE decays faster than 12 DTE
pnl_drivers.secondary_driver: OTM positioning (30Î”) means less gamma risk than 40Î” variant

greeks_profile.theta: positive â€” 9 DTE decays faster than 12 DTE
greeks_profile.vega: slightly positive â€” 12 DTE has marginally more vega
greeks_profile.delta: slightly positive â€” 30Î” call selection, more OTM
greeks_profile.gamma: lower than 7/9 variant â€” 30Î” has less gamma than 40Î”

exit_rules.note: Exit when call tested at -20 delta â€” this risk management rule reduces max loser from $1,308 (7/9) to $513 (9/12)

pnl_drivers.ideal_scenario: SPX stays below 30Î” strike. 9 DTE option decays, 12 DTE retains value. Close at 50% profit or exit if delta reaches -20. Avg 5.7 days in trade.
